Update Notes
=============

New Update  DLC5

"Dear Painkiller followers,

I just set an update live that sets the path for  DLC5  and  also  adds  a
number of fixes to the game. I will get back to you on that  later  today

Enjoy DLC5 in which we try out a new game mode :) Play Painkiller  from  a
top down perspective

UPDATE

Here is the high level fixlist

rebalanced Solo Survival setup for all maps
player damage effects reworked to closer to original look
fixed crashes related to an unused state local variable
fixed bonus level summaries overwriting
fixed quick fire actions breaking Demon Mode
fixed checkpoints disappearing over network by forcing them to  be  always
revelant when visible
fixed several clientserver synchronization issues in multiplayer
fixed DoubleWeaponPickup respawning at checkpoint loading
fixed unpickable pickups in coop
fixed the mechanics for poison slowdown on players movement
fixed typo in MP menu
text localization fixes for Russian and Itialian language
fixed improper player placement after checkpoint at Military Base
fixed issue when posessed zombies get raised into  the  air  in  the  Town
level

This release adds support for the DLC

Painkiller Hell and Damnation: Heaven's Above

Heaven's Above takes the player out of the  first-person  perspective  and
presents itself as a top-down shooter. Heaven's Above lets you play 5 maps
from the campaign in single player or co-op  mode  including  one  of  the
monumental boss fights

Key Features

Control the battlefield from above
5 campaign maps (playable in single player  and  co-op  mode):  Graveyard,
Town, Babel, Angkor, Pentagon
Encounter one of the hardest big guys in Purgatory: The  Stone  Golem  aka
Oriental Demon
New power-ups and environmental  weapons  (including  howitzer  gun,  fire
traps, electro shockers and squeezers
New Steam achievements
All weapons from the original PK HD plus throwable mines

Instructions
=============

This release requires the following updates installed before you begin

Painkiller.Hell.and.Damnation.Update.1-SKIDROW
Painkiller.Hell.and.Damnation.Update.2.and.3.incl.DLC-SKIDROW
Painkiller.Hell.and.Damnation.Update.4.to.7.incl.DLC-SKIDROW
PainkillerHellAndDamnationUpdate8inclDLC-FLTDOX

Now unrar the update.exe and run it ( point to your installation
folder if required
Play the game

Due to a different handling of the steam cloud in this game, you won't
be able to continue from a save game, that was created with SR's emu.
